product_name: Yellowstone and Grand Teton National Park Deck - Deck of Cards
long_description: Collect 'em, trade 'em and put 'em on the fridge after you've hiked 'em! The. Deck of cards with hard case; color photographs. The Mountaineers Books; copyright 2010. Features 33 of the finest hikes in both parks; cards feature directions, distance, difficulty, time, best season, nearest campground, best wildlife viewing and a basic map. Hikes are numbered 1 to 33 and color-coded by region. Deck measure 6 x 4.5 in.
short_description: Collect 'em, trade 'em and put 'em on the fridge after you've hiked 'em! The Yellowstone and Grand Teton National Park Deck is sure to please hiking enthusiasts.
